data.title: The Highest Grossing Movies At The Box Office Every Year Since 1977
data.meta_description: We've put together a list of the highest-grossing films at the North American box office since 1977
data.text:
Deadline has compiled a list of the highest-grossing movies at the North American box office for each since 1977, including the most recent winner, 2023’s Barbie. With a few noted exceptions, the list is dominated by superheroes, Star Wars, animation and, of course, Harry Potter.

Click on the photo above to launch the photo gallery to see how many you remember.

2023 – Barbie

Distributor: Warner Bros.

Release Date: 7/19/2023

North American Total: $636,238,421

2022 – Top Gun: Maverick

Distributor: Paramount Pictures

Release Date: 5/20/2022

North American Total: $718,318,561

2021 – Spider-Man: No Way Home

Distributor: Sony Pictures Entertainment

Release Date: 12/17/2021

North American Total: $804,793,477

2020 – Bad Boys For Life

Distributor: Sony Pictures Entertainment

Release Date: 1/17/20

North American Total: $206,305,244

2019 – Avengers: Endgame

Distributor: Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures

Release Date: 4/26/19

North American Total: $858,373,000

2018 – Black Panther

Distributor: Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures

Release Date: 2/13/18

North American Total: $700,426,566

2017 – Star Wars: The Last Jedi

Distributor: Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures

Release Date: 12/15/17

North American Total: $620,181,382

2016 – Finding Dory

Release Date: 6/17/16
